1.title: Search for the Big Seven - Part 1: The Garden of Eden

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: When five youngsters set off for an adventure into to the vast Addo Elephant National Park, they get more than they had bargained for.

2.title: Search for the Big Seven - Part 2: The Big Ones

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Woken up by the sweet song of hummingbirds, the adventurers continue their quest for the Big Seven.

3.title: Search for the Big Seven - Part 3: Whale of a Time

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The search for the Big Seven continues, and the Zebra Bus heads for the marine and coastal section of the park in Algoa Bay.

4.title: Search for the Big Seven - Part 4: Hunters of the Deep

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: The Zebra Bus embarks on a final mission to find that last and most elusive member of the Big Seven - the Great White Shark.

5.title: To the River's End

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Nestled between a mountain range and the coast, lies an enchanted rainforest through which crystal clear rivers flow - much of this natural domain falls in the Garden Route National Park.

6.title: The Enchanted Forest

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The team is back in the largest evergreen moist forest in South Africa.

7.title: Chronicles of the Foreland

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Known for its rich biodiversity and heritage, the Cape of Good Hope is where Table Mountain is found - one of the Seven Wonders of the World.

8.title: Surfing Snails

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: After their bout with wind, rain and the history of the Cape, the time has come for the team to have a close look at the animal world of Table Mountain National Park.

9.title: Under the Sea

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: The team travels further into the realm of the sea with canoes to study a penguin colony on the beach from across the water.

10.title: Cliffhanger

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: The team head up to the top of Table Mountain and learn about life amongst the clouds.

11.title: Episode #1.11

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Imagine a place that is half land, half water - and you have the West Coast National Park.

12.title: Desert Coast

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Namaqualand is a desert region along the west side of South Africa, also known as the Succulent Karoo. The team's mission is to cross the Kamiesberge on their way to the desert coast, one of the least known parts of South Africa.

13.title: The Flowering Desert

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: When they return to the Namaqua National Park, the short rainy season has started and the desert is in full bloom. This time their mission is to find out how plants, animals and people survive in a land that is harsh.

14.title: Tshavhadzimu

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: In the land of rainmakers and baobab trees, the Zebra Bus travels in the shadow of the ancient Kingdom of Mapungubwe, also known in Venda as Tshavhadzimu or 'Place of the Gods'.

15.title: Mountain of Water

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: 'Thaba ya metsi' ('Mountain of Water') is the local name for the Waterberg Mountains, located in the Marakele National Park- the next sanctuary that our latest group of adventurers will explore.

16.title: Noah's Ark

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Five young adventurers take you on a wild Zebra Bus ride to experience a modern day version of Noah's Ark.

17.title: Into the Thirstland

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: The Zebra bus ventures into the Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park during the rainy season, when animals and people celebrate the much-needed rains.

18.title: When the Moon Talks

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: The rains have already gone, leaving the Kalahari brown and dry again when our adventurers return to continue their journey with the San.

19.title: Searching for White Eye

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: One beautiful sunny day on the edge of the Karoo, the Zebra Bus adventurers are on a quest for a legendary cheetah called White Eye.

20.title: Horn of Africa

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: After their brush with life and death in the wilderness, the adventurers are more than eager to explore the land further and see firsthand how the game rangers handle endangered species like the rhino.

21.title: The Golden Gate

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: The Zebra Bus treks up the high grassy plains of Golden Gate Highlands National Park, where some of the most dramatic landscapes can be found.

22.title: Place of Big Noise

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Hear the mighty Augrabies Falls roar as our new batch of explorers venture into its misty beauty.

23.title: On the Spoor of the Big Snake - Part 1: The Serpent's Nest

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: In the far northwest of South Africa lies a forgotten land, known as the Richtersveld. Five young explorers set off from Alexander Bay High School on a mission into the arid land to find the legendary Big Snake.

24.title: On the Spoor of the Big Snake - Part 2: Signs from the Past

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: The search for the Big Snake continues as the Zebra Bus team treks further and further into the ancient mountains in search of signs and messages left from ancient times, when people roamed freely across the landscape.

25.title: On the Spoor of the Big Snake - Part 3: Making Deep Tracks

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: Now that they have visited the richest of all deserts in the world in terms of biodiversity, and they have seen the oldest paintings in Africa, they are ready to visit the biggest canyon on the continent.

26.title: On the Spoor of the Big Snake - Part 4: To the River's End

episode of.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (TV Series 2015– )

26.plot: Charting new territory, the team sets off down the Great !Gariep with the help of a local Nama farmer and friend of Oompie's, Oom Koos.

locations: Addo Elephant National Park, Addo, Eastern Cape, South Africa::(Episode 1-4)
Garden Route National Park, Western Cape, South Africa::(Episode 5-6)
Table Mountain National Park, Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa::(Episode 7-10)
West Coast National Park, Western Cape, South Africa::(Episode 11)
Namaqua National Park, Northern Cape, South Africa::(Episode 12-13)
Richtersveld National Park, Alexander Bay, Northern Cape, South Africa::(Episode 23-26)
Marakele National Park, Limpopo, South Africa::(Episode 15)
Mokala National Park, Northern Cape, South Africa::(Episode 16)
Mountain Zebra National Park, Eastern Cape, South Africa::(Episode 19-20)
imdb.plot outline: Siyaya - Come wild with us is a fast-paced adventure to fascinating places in and around South Africa's national parks. In the fun-packed episodes, you will see places and meet people that you would never even dream existed. The series unravels the mysteries of the natural world and imparts a sense of wonder and respect for Nature in young people, leaving them fully convinced of the need to preserve our last wild places for future generations. The series is hosted by a zany and mischievous scientist called Oompie, who drives a trendy zebra-striped minibus. Join the team as they explore caves, run wild rivers, abseil down mountain cliffs and investigate the world under the sea. See them have close encounters as they touch, feel, smell and experience Nature at its wildest. In each episode they take on unimaginable challenges, making simply unforgettable stories.
imdb.title: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us
akas: Siyaya: Come Wild with Us (South Africa)
plot: Siyaya - Come wild with us is a fast-paced adventure to fascinating places in and around South Africa's national parks. In each episode a zany professor takes a group of children to explore one of South Africa's national parks.

Siyaya - Come wild with us is a fast-paced adventure to fascinating places in and around South Africa's national parks. In the fun-packed episodes, you will see places and meet people that you would never even dream existed. The series unravels the mysteries of the natural world and imparts a sense of wonder and respect for Nature in young people, leaving them fully convinced of the need to preserve our last wild places for future generations. The series is hosted by a zany and mischievous scientist called Oompie, who drives a trendy zebra-striped minibus. Join the team as they explore caves, run wild rivers, abseil down mountain cliffs and investigate the world under the sea. See them have close encounters as they touch, feel, smell and experience Nature at its wildest. In each episode they take on unimaginable challenges, making simply unforgettable stories.
